uiBuilder.label: Photobooth Camera
uiBuilder.description: Photobooth component to take snapshots from a connected camera

properties.name: enabled
properties.label: Enabled
properties.description: Whether or not the camera stream is enabled.

properties.name: snapRequested
properties.label: Snap requested
properties.description: A string containing anything that can be passed down to trigger a snap by simply changing the value. Use script to set this value such as Date.now()

properties.name: refreshRequested
properties.label: Refresh requested
properties.description: A string containing anything that can be passed down to trigger refreshing the page by simply changing the value. Use script to set this value such as Date.now()

properties.name: countdownDurationSeconds
properties.label: Countdown duration seconds
properties.description: Number of seconds to wait after Snap Requested to take the shot

properties.name: pauseDurationSeconds
properties.label: Pause between snap seconds
properties.description: How long to pause between each snap in seconds.

properties.name: imageSize
properties.label: Output image size
properties.description: Width and Height of the result (not the video panel) in pixels

properties.name: cameraDeviceId
properties.label: Camera device ID
properties.description: The device id of the preferred camera.  If only one camera is available it will override this setting if different. If the device id is not found the nearest available camera will be used. Get list from PHOTOBOOTH_CAMERA#AVAILABLE_CAMERAS_UPDATED event.

properties.name: watermarkImageUrl
properties.label: Watermark image path
properties.description: Must be a local image path (go to System UI > Images)

properties.name: watermarkImageHeight
properties.label: Watermark image height in pixels
properties.description: Height to scale the watermark image to in pixels. Generally the same as the chin height.

properties.name: watermarkImagePosition
properties.label: Watermark image position
properties.description: Where to place the watermark on the composed output image.

properties.name: numberOfSnaps
properties.label: Number of snaps
properties.description: Whether to operate as a photobooth with 4 snaps or a simple camera with 1.

properties.name: gap
properties.label: Gap in pixels
properties.description: Gap, in pixels, between each snapshot and around the margins.

properties.name: chin
properties.label: Chin height pixels
properties.description: Number of pixels for the height of the 'chin' beneath the snapshots

properties.name: fillStyle
properties.label: Fill style of background
properties.description: The canvas fill style to specify the background color. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CanvasRenderingContext2D/fillStyle

actions.label: Photobooth Image Snapped
actions.description: Dispatched when a photo is snapped.  Includes the imageData in the payload.

payload.name: imageData
payload.label: Image Data
payload.description: The image data from the camera after the snap is completed

actions.label: Photobooth Singles Snapped
actions.description: Dispatched with array of imageData when all indivdiual photo snaps are complete.

payload.name: individualSnaps
payload.label: Individual snaps image data
payload.description: Array of image data from the camera after all individual snaps are completed

actions.label: Photobooth Available Cameras Updated
actions.description: Dispatched when the available cameras are updated.

payload.name: cameras
payload.label: Cameras
payload.description: List of camera objects with the label, deviceId, id (same as deviceId), groupId and kind fields. [{deviceId, id, kind, groupId, kind}]. See https://webrtc.org/

payload.name: selectedDeviceIdFound
payload.label: Selected device ID was found
payload.description: Whether or not the Selected Camera Device ID was found and is in use. If 'false' check Actual Camera Device ID (boundCameraDeviceId) to see if another camera was selected instead.

payload.name: boundCameraDeviceId
payload.label: Actual camera device ID
payload.description: The Device ID of the camera that is actually being used. (May be different from the Selected Camera Device ID if that device could not be found but another camera was available.)

actions.label: Photobooth camera double clicked
actions.description: Dispatched when the user double clicks the component.  Returns the mouse position relative to the component as clientX and clientY.
